sentences.english: The lake lies low by the hill, a tearful entreaty of love at the foot of the inflexible.
sentences.chinese: 湖躺在山腳下，像在執拗者的跟前含淚懇求愛。

sentences.english: There must be a specialty of large peas Fencihu.
sentences.chinese: 其中一定會有奮起湖的特產大碗豆。

sentences.english: West Lake has a Sai Tai, breakwaters repair a Form 6 beautiful bridge.
sentences.chinese: 湖西部有一西堤，堤上修有六座造形優美的橋。

sentences.english: Microorganism in the air gone into the lake affected water quality of it.
sentences.chinese: 空氣中的微生物進入水體影響衡水湖的水質。

sentences.english: Niujuanhu oilfield is located in Santanhu basin, with complicated geology conditions.
sentences.chinese: 地處三塘湖盆地的牛圈湖油田，地質條件比較複雜。

sentences.english: Herrenchiemsee Castle was only partially completed, and Ludwig was only able to spend a few days there in September of 1885.
sentences.chinese: 基姆湖城堡僅僅完成了一部分。

sentences.english: I love fish and you just said there was a lake.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡釣魚，你剛剛也說那邊有個湖了。

sentences.english: Switzerland also shares Lake Constance and Lake Maggiore with its neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士也和鄰國共同擁有康斯坦斯湖和馬焦雷湖。

sentences.english: The lake was possibly ponded by lavas.
sentences.chinese: 這個湖可能是熔岩堵塞河道形成的。

sentences.english: Thus, Palau Jellyfish Lake has the world's only non-toxic jellyfish.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，帕勞水母湖擁有了世界上獨一無二的無毒水母。

sentences.english: Nikko and the Okunikko area around Lake Chuzenji, in particular, are well known for their beautiful autumn colors (koyo).
sentences.chinese: 日光地區湯元及中禪寺湖的紅葉特別著名。

sentences.english: Partner, Lake Partners Strategy Consultants, Seattle, Washington.
sentences.chinese: 搭檔，搭檔湖安全策略顧客，西雅圖，華盛頓。

sentences.english: Purveyor of smoked Canadian trout, Alaskan salmon and Lake Superior whitefish .
sentences.chinese: 接受者加拿大薰鱒魚，阿拉斯加鮭魚和湖優越的白魚。

sentences.english: Avon Lake, Ohio school Address Telephone Fax arrangement.
sentences.chinese: 埃文湖，俄亥俄學校排名電話傳真網址。
